import React, { useState } from "react"; const Contact = () => { const[data,setData] =useState({ fullname:'', email:'', phone:'', msg: '' }); const InputEvent = (event) =>{ const{name, value}= event.target; setData((preVal)=> { return{ ...preVal, [name]: value, } }) } const formSubmit =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); alert(`${data.fullname}`) }; return ( <>

Contact Us

We'll never share your email with anyone else!
); }; export default Contact;
